  • 2008-08-29 12:26:40

    Re: NEW SIGN Up: I just need to ask a few questions please.

    Consultation services are available through the services page on atutor.ca, or you can ask your questions here at no charge.

    Be sure to review the documentation, and search the site first for answers to your questions, before posting them here.

    Unfortunately the email address you provided with your service request is invalid, so we are unable to process the request.

  • 2008-08-29 13:32:44

    Re: NEW SIGN Up: I just need to ask a few questions please.

    Change your email through
    MyAtutor>Manage

    The documentation describes the requirements:
    http://www.atutor.ca/atutor/docs/requirements.php

    If you need paypal support, the ATutor Payments module would need to be installed, and linked to an account PayPal account.

    Please explore the atutor.ca site. I would imagine the majority of your questions will already be answered. All the tools and information required to manage an ATutor system can be found throughout the site by either browsing or using the search tool.

  • 2008-08-29 18:03:14

    Re: NEW SIGN Up: I just need to ask a few questions please.

    I'd suggest trying to install the modules yourself. Most are fairly straight forward. After downloading one, and unzipping it, see the "readme" file included with the module source code for install instructions etc..

    If you do end up needing some help, you might get a Support Ticket 3 Pack ($175). Use one for an install, and one per module. Left over tickets can be used any time.

    If you are referring to the payments module (see it's readme file), is your paypal account already setup?



    http://www.atutor.ca/view/7/13078/1.html
